data.text: @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia Am pretty sure we going to wait for budget ya 2022 and 2023 ka April gore reconsideration di be sharp,its so sad
@sibongilelunga @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia They eventually responded but still did not answer the question. I give up.
@Lez34201736 @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia They respond to their DM's after 2 months dont even bother

@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia At this point I'm good with you guys not giving me the R350. Keep it, ngiright shame. After 6months going up and down with no assistance. After 6 months of being approved with paydays and not getting the money, your person on the DM insisting that I was paid âœŒ

@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia The only thing we know about you guys is treating the poor masses as idiots who are begging from you, even now you are delaying to let people see their status for March, why all this???
